entries.title: Apple to start making MacBooks in Vietnam by mid-2023

entries.title: More than two dozen killed in New York snowstorm
entries.description: Local officials describe blizzard as area’s deadliest in decades after fatalities rise to 25

entries.title: Prominent Algerian journalist Ihsane El-Kadi arrested
entries.description: Authorities shut Radio M internet station, viewed as last remaining media outlet for free speech in the country

entries.title: Saudi Arabia celebrates step change in Christmas festivities
entries.description: Conservative kingdom opens up to the Christian holiday as it pushes through a series of modernising reforms

entries.title: Uruguay’s global ambitions shake up Latin America’s Mercosur trade bloc

entries.title: Hot property: four homes for sale in the Scottish Highlands

entries.title: China launches military drills around Taiwan after US passes defence act

entries.title: Art fair director Shuyin Yang’s Singapore

entries.title: Happy holidays, America — make the most of your scanty allowance
entries.description: US workers are short-changed over paid leave and debate about post-pandemic wellbeing misses its benefits

entries.title: Leading ECB policymaker hints at sharp climb to peak rates
entries.description: Dutch governor Klaas Knot signals European Central Bank will keep raising rates as ‘second half’ of tightening cycle begins

entries.title: Chinese vaccine tourists flock to Macau for mRNA Covid jabs
entries.description: Explosion of cases and ban on more effective western shots lead residents to look abroad
